And since wikipedia is of course 100% credible…

But i’m not going off of Wikipedias knowledge i knew beforehand it was a medium-level, it’s only backing up my theory.[/quote]

Just because it has high and low level capabilities, doesn’t make it medium. It’s still high level.

item.title: First Player Shooting Game. C++
item.dc:creator: @CodyPkz1 CodyPkz™
item.description:
@CodyPkz1 wrote:

[quote=“Fusion Realm ©, post:11, topic:368812”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=464944.msg3399829#msg3399829 date=1289794163]
Go Google the OpenGL API.

But first, judging by your post, go learn C++.

Edit:
And you’re going to need to learn a scripting language.
C++ is not one of them.

C++ is a low-level programming language, and is also the market default for game programming. C++ is nothing to fuck with.
[/quote]

C++ is a high level programing language…[/quote]
It’s actaully a low level programming language, in C# it’s

} If (This.text == "this") MessageBox("Test") } Else { MessageBox("h") {

In C++ It’s

{ cout << "test1"<< endl; cout << "test2" << endl; }

Which one looks more to the human language? i’m saying C# And the C++ code will have error’s since you didnt include the namespace std & That code looks like more machine language than human

Read full topic

item.title: First Player Shooting Game. C++
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Fusion Realm ©, post:11, topic:368812”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=464944.msg3399829#msg3399829 date=1289794163]
C++ is a low-level programming language, and is also the market default for game programming. C++ is nothing to fuck with.
[/quote]
C++ is a high level programing language…[/quote]
First off, C++ is neither a low-level or high-level programming language, i believe it’s classified as a medium-level programming language. Although it does have some low and high levels of language features.

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:1, topic:368812”]does anyone have a tut or a code or anysort of c++ gamescripting to help me out to make a
bad verson of cod?
thanks.[/quote]Stick to java my friend, i’ve been messing around with C++ for almost a year and it still hurts my head.
And a bad version of cod? No offense but it takes many many highly educated experts months/years to make CoD, The closest you’re going to get is a bad version
of counter strike…

EDIT: If you want to get serious about this, and want some good help from non-runescape players and more intelligent people when it comes to this head over to mitb. http://moparisthebest.org/smf

Read full topic

item.title: First Player Shooting Game. C++
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:8, topic:368812”]If you was speaking on behalf of the “high-level”, “low-level” thing. I say they’re high-level because;

“Such languages are considered high-level because they are closer to human languages and further from machine languages.”

  • http://www.webopedia.com/TERM/H/high_level_language.html[/quote]

right, and i would consider c a lot closer to the machine language than, say, java. thus, relative terms (and also subjective, since apparently you disagree)
